channel.title: Projects on N Acharya
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on N Acharya

item.title: Software Playground
item.description: Mostly code playground for Technology actively used 2022 Frameworks: NodeJS, TensorFlow, Jupyter, Hugo Languages: Go, Python3, TypeScript, C, C++, F# UI: React, Angular Data: S3 Data Access, EdgeFile

item.title: Wealth Forecast for Portfolios
item.description: Financial Predictions using AI/ML Looking for a good way to predict in linear curves. Here we look at SVM, RandomForest and LinearRegression. We try to come up with a decent prediction by looking at all three. wfc

item.title: Eblackboard: a small edu platform
item.description: Empowering students with Technology This project was all about creating a small educational platform for people in hardship with a dearth of technological environments. Created small lab environments using Raspberry Pi with the help of EBlackboard and Rotary
